November 6, 2016, John worked with Colyn in the same group

John was engineering lead in our frontend development group at GoDaddy. I got to work with him for several months. I was always impressed by the breadth of experience and skills he brought to the team, particularly with SEO, site performance, and security - all of which are especially important for a website that gets the traffic GoDaddy does. Outside of GoDaddy, I have learned a lot from him with respect to WordPress security and hardening it from common exploits. His technical leadership and confidence will bring a lot of value to any organization.

Working with John has been a real pleasure. In meetings he never hesitated to give intelligent, thoughtful, insightful input. September 7, 2016, Ryan reported directly to John

Working closely with John over the past two years to start has developed me into a much stronger developer. He created a development path to help me become a better developer that took me from working on Wordpress plugins to developing entire applications in Ruby on Rails. He was always available to work through complex coding issues helped me to see things in a different light. I would say that the experience I gained working with John is the most valuable experience I gained in my years of working with web technology. He would be a great asset as a leader or member of any development team.
